apiDescription: An iterator over a slice in (non-overlapping) chunks (chunk_size elements at a time).
When the slice len is not evenly divided by the chunk size, the last slice of the iteration will be the remainder.
This struct is created by the chunks method on slices.

trait implementations.name: impl<'a, T> std::iter::Iterator for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::DoubleEndedIterator for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::clone::Clone for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::TrustedLen for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::fmt::Debug for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T> where T: 'a + std::fmt::Debug
impl<'a, T> std::iter::ExactSizeIterator for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::FusedIterator for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::marker::Send for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T> where T: std::marker::Sync
impl<'a, T> std::marker::Sync for std::slice::Chunks<'a, T> where T: std::marker::Sync
